entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
